document.full_text: gil scott-heron, a poet and songwriter credited with helping inspire the development of rap music, has died at age 62, according to media reports on saturday.
document.title: gil scott-heron, credited with inspiring rap, dies
lines_and_colors: gil scott-heron, a poet and songwriter credited with helping inspire the development of rap music, has died at age 62, according to media reports on saturday.
